Specific Ingredients: Chopped Tomatoes with Herbs in Tomato Juice (ASDA)

Recipe Name: 1. Cook the Mince over a medium heat until browned. (Optional add herbs and spices: Paprika, Cajun, Nutmeg, Cumin, etc.)

3. Add the Chopped Tomatoes and 1/2-3/4 tin of water (Less water if in a rush). Bring up to the boil, then reduce to a simmer. Stir in the harissa, season, then simmer gently for 20 minutes (or until properly mixed and reduced if in a rush).
4. Any any non-frozen Vegetables to the pan.
5. Rip the Mozzarella into pieces and scatter over dish, cook until melted.
